message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for your business. My asking price is $1750000, reflecting its unique capabilities and high market demand. I'm confident this is a fair price, and I'm open to discussing it further if you have any questions.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget is more limited. I would like to propose a price of $1600000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm willing to be flexible, $1600000 is a bit below my minimum asking price. I'm willing to come down to $1650000 to show my commitment to reaching an agreement. This price reflects the significant value this product will bring to your business, and I believe it's still a fair deal considering its unique benefits.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $1625000. This offers a compromise between our positions and I believe it's a fair price for the product.
